properties.copyright: 1989 Sea Of Glass Music, Administered by Sea Of Glass Music

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Fill my cup fill it up
Baptize me in the crystal sea
And fill me up
Fill my cup fill it up
Capture me with Your Spirit
Please and fill me up

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Here's my cup
Would You fill it up
Would You let me overflow
My heart just wants to show

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
How I love you
I will sing
And I will shout
Makin' music to You Lord
My heart will strike the chord
Of my steadfast love

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Fill my cup fill it up
With the fallin' rain
Fill my cup fill it up
Like it was again

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Come and dine come and walk
Through the open door
I've had a taste of Your love
And I want more more more

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
When I'm blue
And it dims my view
Like a faded photograph
Just blow away the chaff

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Let the wind blow
I get weary
And I get worn
And I lose my point of view
But I'll get my eye on You
And I won't let go
